properties.description: Warm welcome space, open to all. We offer free WiFi, public computers, printing services, activities, groups and study areas. Library membership is not required to use the space, but it is available, providing free access to books, eBooks, eMagazines and eNewspapers, health equipment, language learning , iPad loans and more... For more information on our services, please visit: https://www.somerset.gov.uk/libraries/
